CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 30, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "Model - Charming Lillian Allen, whose clothes are fascinating, will show some of her sharpest togs at the April 9 Fashion Show at Schenley High School put on by the Beauty Shop Owners. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of beauty shop owner Lillian Allen wearing suit with contrasting trim and mink fur stole, standing beside fence in front of Falk School
